q_en: What products are included in James's order?
gt:
Hey there! üòÑ Let's take a look at what products are included in James's order. Here's a neat table summarizing the details:

| **Product Type** | **Attributes**   | **Quantity** |
|------------------|------------------|--------------|
| Jacket           | Brown, L size    | 185          |
| Jacket           | Yellow, L size   | 200          |
| Jacket           | Brown, S size    | 175          |
| Skirt            | Purple, M size   | 200          |
| Coat             | Red, M size      | 330          |

James has quite a stylish selection, don't you think? If you have any more questions, feel free to ask! üòä

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'James';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "James"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = '4';
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for the customer with the name "James"

steps.sql: SELECT product_id, number FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = '4');
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs and quantities for each order associated with the customer "James"

steps.sql: SELECT p.attributes, pt.description FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE p.id IN (SELECT product_id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = '4'));
steps.description: Retrieve the product attributes and type descriptions for the products in the orders
